frontmatter.title: How Do Badminton Players Make Money? (2020)
frontmatter.description: Badminton isn’t the richest sport in the world. Especially in western countries where there is little media coverage and where live sports are dominated by Football. You don’t see Badminton players in TV ads or cameoing in movies. So how do Badminton player make money?
